com.flurry.android.ads

Interface FlurryAdBannerListener


  • public interface FlurryAdBannerListener
    The listener for Banner ads. A listener is set of callback methods that allow a developer to manage and take actions within different phases of ad display.
    Author:
    2009-2015 Flurry, Inc. All Rights Reserved
    See Also:
    Flurry Publisher Support Site

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAppExit(FlurryAdBanner adBanner)
      Invoked when the user is about to be taken outside the app.
      void onClicked(FlurryAdBanner adBanner)
      Invoked when an ad is clicked.
      void onCloseFullscreen(FlurryAdBanner adBanner)
      Invoked when an expanded ad is closed.
      void onError(FlurryAdBanner adBanner, FlurryAdErrorType adErrorType, int errorCode)
      Invoked when an error occurs.
      void onFetched(FlurryAdBanner adBanner)
      Invoked when an ad is fetched.
      void onRendered(FlurryAdBanner adBanner)
      Invoked when an ad is rendered.
      void onShowFullscreen(FlurryAdBanner adBanner)
      Invoked when an ad is expanded to fullscreen.
      void onVideoCompleted(FlurryAdBanner adBanner)
      Invoked when video viewing has been completed.

    • Method Detail

      • onFetched

        void onFetched(FlurryAdBanner adBanner)
        Invoked when an ad is fetched. This method indicates that an ad has been received from the server and stored locally.
        Parameters:
        adBanner - The corresponding banner ad object.

      • onRendered

        void onRendered(FlurryAdBanner adBanner)
        Invoked when an ad is rendered. This method indicates that an ad has been rendered.
        Parameters:
        adBanner - The corresponding banner ad object.

      • onShowFullscreen

        void onShowFullscreen(FlurryAdBanner adBanner)
        Invoked when an ad is expanded to fullscreen. This method indicates that an ad has been expanded to fullscreen.
        Parameters:
        adBanner - The corresponding banner ad object.

      • onCloseFullscreen

        void onCloseFullscreen(FlurryAdBanner adBanner)
        Invoked when an expanded ad is closed. This method indicates that an expanded ad has closed.
        Parameters:
        adBanner - The corresponding banner ad object.

      • onAppExit

        void onAppExit(FlurryAdBanner adBanner)
        Invoked when the user is about to be taken outside the app. This method indicates that an ad has been clicked and the user is about to be taken outside the app.
        Parameters:
        adBanner - The corresponding banner ad object.

      • onClicked

        void onClicked(FlurryAdBanner adBanner)
        Invoked when an ad is clicked. This method indicates that an ad has been clicked.
        Parameters:
        adBanner - The corresponding banner ad object.

      • onVideoCompleted

        void onVideoCompleted(FlurryAdBanner adBanner)
        Invoked when video viewing has been completed. This method indicates that video viewing has been completed. The app can check the server for the rewards if this is a rewarded ad space.
        Parameters:
        adBanner - The corresponding banner ad object.

      • onError

        void onError(FlurryAdBanner adBanner,
           FlurryAdErrorType adErrorType,
           int errorCode)
        Invoked when an error occurs. This method indicates that an error has occurred.
        Parameters:
        adBanner - The corresponding banner ad object.
        adErrorType - The type of error.
        errorCode - The error code.
